name: Everpath: A pixel art roguelite
description:
Everpath is a roguelite action RPG with hand-crafted pixel art, based on the dungeon system of the great Binding of Isaac and the combat and items system of the classics action RPGs. Embark yourself as a member of the army of Northbarrow, choose your character background and find what is lurking in the wildeneress of the lands of Northbarrow.

Explore a procedural generated world fighting throu hordes of unique enemies, play through different runs fighting with your prefered class, fight style, starting perks, item stats choices and more.
